tha-ap144:1.3_0: I practiced what was happening to him—
tha-ap144:2.3_0: Taking a flower from its flowers,
tha-ap144:3.2_0: Oh, the accomplishments of the Teacher!
tha-ap144:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap144:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap144:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Daṇḍaka.
